Tnt , HunPos and TreeTagger.from sentence: In an initial investigation , we compared Tnt , HunPos and TreeTagger and found Tnt to be consistently better than Treetagger , Hunpos followed closely but crashed on some languages ( e.g. , Arabic ) .

is.from sentence: The combined word + character representation model is the best representation , outperforming the baseline on all except one language ( Indonesian ) , providing strong results already without pre-trained embeddings .

biggest improvement.from sentence: This model ( w + c ) reaches the biggest improvement ( more than + 2 % accuracy ) on Hebrew and Slovene .

over all best system.from sentence: The over all best system is the multi-task bi - LSTM FREQBIN ( it uses w + c and POLYGLOT initialization for w ) .

Initializing.from sentence: Initializing the word embeddings ( + POLYGLOT ) with off - the - shelf languagespecific embeddings further improves accuracy .
